org.anddev.andengine.opengl.texture
Interface ITexture

All Known Subinterfaces:
ITextureAtlas<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BitmapTextureAtlas, BuildableBitmapTextureAtlas, BuildableTextureAtlas, ETC1Texture, PVRGZTexture, PVRTexture, Texture, TextureAtlas
public interface ITexture

An Texture is an image in the graphic's memory. Android requires OpenGL textures to have a width and height of the power of 2. Therefore AndEngine assembles a texture from a couple of ITexture sources, so memory can be used more efficiently.
(c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich
(c) 2011 Zynga Inc.

Since:
15:01:03 - 11.07.2011
Author:
Nicolas Gramlich
